p: It became clear through many studies after the first outbreak of SARS-CoV, that plant extracts and plant-derived compounds act against viruses in different mechanisms. These range from direct antiviral activity, immune stimulator, analgesic, inflammation modulator, and symptom management. The direct antiviral activity encompasses inhibition of early replication via viral entry inhibition (Cheng et al., 2006a), and late replication inhibition ( Kim et al., 2011) ( Fig. 3 ) ( Fig. 4).
